books.author: by Mitchell Zuckoff with members of the Annex Security Team
books.description: Six C.I.A. contract employees discuss their experience during the attack on the State Department compound and the C.I.A. station called the “annex” in Benghazi in 2012.
books.name: 13 HOURS

books.author: by Laura Hillenbrand
books.description: An Olympic runner’s story of survival as a prisoner of the Japanese in World War II.
books.name: UNBROKEN

books.author: by Daniel James Brown
books.description: The University of Washington’s eight-oar crew and their quest for gold at the 1936 Berlin Olympics.
books.name: THE BOYS IN THE BOAT

books.author: by Laura L. Schroff
books.description: The long friendship between a sales executive and a destitute boy.
books.name: AN INVISIBLE THREAD

books.author: by Randall Munroe
books.description: Scientific (but often humorous) answers to hypothetical questions, based in part on the author’s website, xkcd.com.
books.name: WHAT IF?

books.author: by David Limbaugh
books.description: The lawyer and political commentator uses his legal training to evaluate, and affirm, the truthfulness of the Bible.
books.name: JESUS ON TRIAL

books.author: by Henry Kissinger
books.description: The elder statesman offers a view of how to build an international order in today’s world.
books.name: WORLD ORDER

books.author: by Jay Sekulow with Jordan Sekulow and others
books.description: An examination of the jihadist group and a warning about its dangers.
books.name: RISE OF ISIS

books.author: by Cheryl Strayed
books.description: A woman’s account of a life-changing 1,100-mile hike along the Pacific Crest Trail during the summer of 1995.
books.name: WILD

books.author: by Naomi Klein
books.description: The journalist, author of “The Shock Doctrine,” makes the case for the existence of climate change and argues that the market cannot solve the crisis.
books.name: THIS CHANGES EVERYTHING

books.author: by Rita Golden Gelman
books.description: A memoir by a woman who sold her possessions and embraced the world.
books.name: TALES OF A FEMALE NOMAD

books.author: by Phil Mason
books.description: A historical study of small events that had great impacts.
books.name: NAPOLEON'S HEMORRHOIDS

books.author: by Billy Crystal
books.description: The 65-year-old comedian’s reminiscences and his complaints about aging.
books.name: STILL FOOLIN' 'EM

books.author: by Piper Kerman
books.description: A Brooklyn woman’s prison memoir. The basis for the Netflix series, originally published in 2010.
books.name: ORANGE IS THE NEW BLACK

books.author: by Geoffrey C. Ward and Ken Burns
books.description: A companion volume to the PBS series examines the lives of Theodore, Eleanor and Franklin.
books.name: THE ROOSEVELTS
